T=int(raw_input())
for test in xrange(T):
    n=int(raw_input())
    a=map(int,raw_input().split())
    b=map(int,raw_input().split())
    s=[]
    map(s.append,zip(a,[1]*len(a)))
    map(s.append,zip(b,[-1]*len(b)))
    s.sort()
    ans=now=0
    for x,y in s:
        now+=y
        ans=max(ans,now)
    print ans
